org.forgerock.cuppa.reporters

Class DefaultReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.cuppa.reporters.DefaultReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reporter

    public final class DefaultReporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Reporter
    An RSpec-like reporter.
